de.bioforscher.singa.core.biology

Class Organism

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bioforscher.singa.core.biology.Organism
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable<NCBITaxonomyIdentifier>, Nameable

    public class Organism
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, Identifiable<NCBITaxonomyIdentifier>
    The organism class is used to store information about organisms, such as NCBITaxonomyIdentifier, names, and linage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Organism(java.lang.String scientificName)
      Creates a new organism with the given scientific name.

    • Method Summary
